title: S'mores Pieces Cheesecake
ingredients: ¼ cup butter or margarine, melted
1 (7 ounce) package HERSHEY'S S'mores Baking Pieces, divided
instructions: 1. Heat oven to 350 degrees F. Grease sides of 9-inch springform pan. Wrap outside of pan with foil, extending foil at least 2 inches up pan sides. 2. For the crumb crust: Stir together graham cracker crumbs and sugar; blend in melted butter or margarine. Press mixture onto bottom and ½ inch up side of springform pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, then cool. 3. For the brownie layer: Stir together melted butter, sugar, and vanilla extract. Add eggs, stirring until blended. Stir in flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt; blend well. Spread in prepared pan and bake for 25 to 30 minutes until brownie begins to pull away from side of pan. Meanwhile, make cheesecake batter. 4. For the cheesecake: Beat cream cheese, sugar, and vanilla until smooth. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. 5. Immediately spoon cheesecake mixture over brownie layer. Place in water bath and continue baking for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is set. Cool to room temperature. 6. For topping: Reserve marshmallows and chocolate chips. Microwave reserved marshmallows and cream until melted and smooth. Spread over top of cheesecake and sprinkle remaining s'mores mixture. Drizzle melted chocolate over top. Chill about 2 hours before serving.
